 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַלְבִים‎</span> **proper name, of a location** (perhaps haunt of ***foxes***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šêlibu***</u></abbr>, ***fox***); — in (original) territory of Dan, [[Judg.1.35|Judg 1:35]] (compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]], on etymology and site), [[1Kgs.4.9|1Kgs 4:9]], <span class="bdbLangGreek">Θαλαβεειν</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σαλαβειμ</span>, Judges also <span class="bdbLangGreek">αἱ ἀλώπεκες</span>, as doublet, or ([[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup>) alone; = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעֲלַבִּין‎</span> [[Josh.19.42|Josh 19:42]], <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σα</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">α</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">λαβειν</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעֲלַבִּין‎</span> see foregoing.
